DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intracoronary selective thrombolysis effective tirofiban coronary flow primary percutaneous coronary intervention acute myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Intracoronary Prourokinase Coronary Flow During Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: STsegment elevation AMI within 12 hour symptom onset Contraindications thrombolysis PCI Patients administer fibrinolytic agent PCI Patients enrol clinical trial
